title: NE North Platte NE Zone Forecast
text:
NE North Platte NE Zone Forecast for Sunday, January 14, 2024
941 FPUS53 KLBF 151001
ZFPLBF
Zone Forecast Product for Nebraska
National Weather Service North Platte NE
401 AM CST Mon Jan 15 2024
NEZ059-151115-
Lincoln-
Including the city of North Platte
401 AM CST Mon Jan 15 2024
...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY...
.TODAY...Brisk. Cloudy with snow likely in the morning, then
partly sunny with a slight chance of snow in the afternoon. Snow
accumulation around 1 inch. Highs around 2. North winds 15 to
25 mph. Chance of precipitation 70 percent. Wind chill readings
20 below to 30 below zero.
.TONIGHT...Clear. Lows around 15 below. West winds 10 to 15 mph.
Wind chill readings 33 below to 43 below zero.
.TUESDAY...Sunny. Highs around 20. West winds 10 to 20 mph.
Lowest wind chill readings 32 below to 42 below zero in the
morning.
.TUESDAY NIGHT...Partly cloudy in the evening then clearing. Lows
around 5. West winds 10 to 15 mph.
.WEDNESDAY...Mostly sunny in the morning, then mostly cloudy with
a slight chance of snow in the afternoon. Highs around 30.
Northwest winds around 10 mph, becoming northeast in the
afternoon. Chance of precipitation 20 percent.
.WEDNESDAY NIGHT...Mostly cloudy. A slight chance of snow in the
evening. Lows around 5. Chance of precipitation 20 percent.
.THURSDAY...Mostly cloudy in the morning, then becoming partly
sunny. A 50 percent chance of snow. Highs in the mid 20s.
Temperature falling to around 20 in the afternoon.
.THURSDAY NIGHT...Partly cloudy. Lows around 2 below.
.FRIDAY...Mostly sunny. Highs around 16.
.FRIDAY NIGHT...Partly cloudy in the evening, then becoming
mostly cloudy. Lows around 2.
.SATURDAY...Partly sunny. Highs in the lower 20s.
.SATURDAY NIGHT...Mostly cloudy. Lows around 12.
.SUNDAY...Partly sunny. Highs in the mid 30s.
